field.name: headertype
field.label: Header Type
field.description: Header display method: Image should be 32-bit transparent PNG or must match body background image.

field.name: menuposition
field.label: Menu Position
field.description: Display your main menu next to the logo or below the logo. This option is useful for larger logos or for menus that contain more menu items.

field.name: header_top_pad
field.label: Logo Top Padding
field.description: Adds margin to the top of your logo

field.name: header_bot_pad
field.label: Logo Bottom Padding
field.description: Adds margin to the bottom of your logo

field.name: headline
field.label: Site Title
field.description: The site title is rendered for SEO purposes so it is important to customize this regardless of 'text' or 'graphic' Header Mode (configured above).

field.name: tagline
field.label: Tagline
field.description: The site description is rendered for SEO purposes so it is important to custommize this regardless of 'text' or 'graphic' Header Mode (configured above).

field.name: style
field.label: Template Color Style
field.description: Select which of the style variations you wish to use.

field.name: body_font
field.label: Body Font
field.description: Select the default font face for the body

field.name: header_font
field.label: Heading Font
field.description: Select the default font face for the headers

field.name: columns
field.label: Columns
field.description: You can set the default widths and arrange the main columns. Any columns that are unused will just be hidden and the main column will be widened.

field.name: headerscript
field.label: Header Script
field.description: If you need to add scripts to your header (like Google verification code, perhaps), you should enter them here.

field.name: footerscript
field.label: Footer Script
field.description: If you need to add scripts to your footer (like Google Analytics tracking code), you should enter them here.

field.name: rebrand
field.label: Remove Branding
field.description: Our templates come with some branding. If you wish to remove it please purchase the rights to remove our branding by clicking on the link provided before disabling it here. Rebranding is handled as an honor system, we don't monitor or verify if you have purchased it, so please be respectful of our licensing terms.

field.name: mootools
field.label: Enable Mootools
field.description: Turn off Joomla core Mootools.js. This will speed up yor site if you are not using frontend editing features.
